page.title: 19TRANSPORT
page.content: The{Leyland Railway Station}is on the main Glasgow to London line. The service is used by working people and students, especially on the six minute journey to Preston. In Leyland two bus companies operate.{Fishwicks Buses}run every ten minutes towards Leyland passing the Queen Hotel.{Ribble Buses pass through Leyland every hour from Preston to Wigan and every half hour from Leyland to Chorley.{The M6 {Motorway}is a link road in Leyland. Bus services which operate from Leyland include 109 and 119 Preston.Chorley via Lostock Hall,Leyland and Euxton _ 111 Preston.
